mapper.select: select CAST(p_id as varchar(20)) as id,project_name as name,business_type_code as pId,0 as [nocheck] from JEHR_project t union all select CAST(dictionary_code as varchar(20)) as id,dictionary_name as name,NULL as pId,1 as [nocheck] from JEHR_data_dictionary where dictionary_code in( select distinct business_type_code from JEHR_project)
